name: Whole Wheat Apple Snack Bars
author: pieceofpie
summary: Quick and easy, wholesome snack bars are easy to take to work or to pack in the kids' lunches.
ingredients: 1 cup apples - peeled, cored, and sliced
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease a 7-inch square baking tin, or line with paper liners
Whisk brown sugar, applesauce, oil, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a large bowl
Combine flour, cinnamon, and baking powder in a separate bowl
Stir into egg mixture until moistened
Spoon 1/2 the batter into the prepared baking tin and spread evenly
Place apple slices on top and cover with remaining batter
Bake in the preheated oven until the top springs back lightly when pressed, about 30 minutes
Remove from the oven and let cool completely before removing from the tin and cutting into bars, about 30 minutes
